body.name: Nikodocr Retro Game Console, Plug and Play Video Game Stick Built in 10000+ Games,9 Classic Emulators, 4K High Definition HDMI Output for TV with Dual Controllers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 57 mins
features: [Massive Childhood Classic Games] Preloaded with 9 emulators(PS1/ATARI/MAME/SFC/FC/GBA/GB/GBC/MD)and equipped with a 64GB TF card, this retro game console contains more than 10000 kinds of classic game. High-performance chip powerful operation ability, the game is more smooth and stable. Perfect for your graphical quality and game fluency needs. Just connect to your TV and enjoy it. Recall the entertainment of your childhood and enjoy family reunion moments without repetition.
[Compact Appearance and Convenience] Compact shape, fashion nice, easy to carry. Plug and play, saving space. Free to play anytime and anywhere.
[HDMI HD output]HDMI HD output, higher visual feast, let your game experience better. Please make sure your screen has an HDMI input port so that the console can connect to your TV/TV set-top box.

[Simple Operation]Connect the gamepad to the power supply, then plug it into the TV, and adjust the TV power to the HD channel to display the game list screen on the TV. The steps are as follows :1. Connect the HD output of the TV 2. Insert the built-in TF game content card 3. Using the charging adapter to connect the power supply will turn on automatically. (2 PCS controllers require 4 AAA batteries, not included in the package)
[Charming Gift for kids, friends and lovers]Support dual sparring, enjoy games with children, friends and beloved ones. Reminisce about your childhood together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Handheld Game Console with Dual Gamepads, Charming Gifts for Kids, Lovers Built in 10,000 + Classic Games: arcade retro games, logic and math, sports, puzzle, arcade, shooting, action, racing, fighting games, strategy, adventure, card games, etc., perfect for all kinds of games you want to play. Perfect Latest TV Game Console , Suitable for 4K Ultra High Definition TV/monitors/projectors/PC/. Hidden U disk design, more than 10000 games + 9 emulators, support 2 players. Great Gift: Elegant and stylish design, the GameBoy is a gift that can create happiness and memories for game lovers. HDMI high-definition output, better gaming experience! Pause/Save/Load/the game, feel free to play any game you like.

Anti-skid and Flexible Design The joystick contains alloy bearing, which will not break even when playing for a long time. The surface of the stick is designed with uneven non-slip lines to ensure accuracy in game operation. Support 9 Emulators PS1/ATARI/MAME/SFC/FC/GBA/GB/GBC/MD games，all waiting for you. You can find the one you want in so many games！ Power Supply for Game Controller Low power consumption chip that adds longer battery life. Standard 3 AAA batteries are used inside the game controller. If you notice a delay or lag in the game, charge the game controller or move away from the router.

Packing List 2 X Game Console 1 X Game Stick 1 X USB Cable 1 X TF Card 1 X User Manual 2PCS Remote Controllers Specification Material: plastic and metal / Plug: USB / Joystick type: 2PCS ControllersOutput: HDMI Output / Support Up to 2 PlayersInput Power: USB 5vOperating Temperature: 0~40℃Distance: 0~10 meters Notice Please read the instructions carefully. Packaging and instructions contain important information, please keep aside.

Power Port Please use a power adapter of 5V/1A or higher to power the game console (e.g. cell phone charger). If the retro game console doesn't work properly, or if there's a game lag, it could be the TV's USB port that doesn't power. HDMI Port Plug the game stick into the TV/PC HDMI port and connect to the power supply. Please make sure your device has an HDMI interface. If a game shows "coin", please press "Select" button to continue. Insert TF Card into Memory Card Slot Before connecting the power supply, insert the TF card. The TF card comes preloaded with 10,000 games, which you can play without any advertising or extra cost. You can play a different game every day.

Main Menu Function 1) Lists: All games in the folder will be displayed on this page, Select up and down, turn the page left and right(there will be hints on the screen which simulator the game is in). 2) Classification: Identifies all emulators that the game stick contains. 3) History: After playing,the game record will be in this interface. 4) Collection: Your favorite games can be added to the collection list. 5) Search: Filter the game according to the game name uppercase letters(note:case insensitive).

Setting Handle press SELECT key to enter Setting List,Language,Key Tone,Search Local File,Restore Default Setting and Exit,System Information,Exit Setting. Game Process 1. Press the Direction key to select the game menu and press the START / A key to enter game. 2. Press B in the game list to return to the Home page. Pause/Save/Load/Exit the game Holding down the Select and START key at the same time in the game bring up a game menu that allows the user to Pause/Save/Load/Exit the game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great I love it!!
reviews.reviewText: So, everything works you are going to watch videos that may say that it was garbage but I guess it depends on who has it! Overall here it works perfectly. Please be careful tho because the directions are NOT clear as to where and how the wires connect. Once you get the wires all connected and working perfectly the game has some lagging depending on the game that you go into but overall most of the games all work some of the picturing all the directions are different but overall it’s great. I will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small, Lite, Compact, Fun
reviews.reviewText: I decided to let myself enjoy this purchase. Took some getting used to. Once figured out it's easy to use. However, there's no space bar key on the search keyboard (I haven't seen one as yet), which can be a bit frustrating when spelling out a game title. If a game title pops up (Search Menu) with multiple titles, the emulator class will change once highlighted. You can then select the game file you want to play based on its emulator. Sometimes you'll have to manually search the selected class emulator to find a specific title you're looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice retro gaming device
reviews.reviewText: Super easy setup, very responsive controls, great old school retro games from home gaming consoles and arcade machines. Highly recommend if you're looking for some fun little nostalgia gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Loved the picture and the memories it revived, but expected more for the buck. Both controllers had problems plus I don't think I saw any manual in there. Overall the picture is great and the size of the game stick is convenient for small places and to travel with it everyhwere. I think is a bit overpriced. It is not 4k, I knew that from the start but being Hdmi did helped the picture a bit. I would recomend but those wireless controllers laged too much. Hope others get some luck in not getting a faulty one. Overall great with all the games it has. 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Controllers are trash
reviews.reviewText: Just a waste because the controllers are so crappy and leggy that it's nearly impossible to play any game correctly. Waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First, this is ONLY 4K. Doesn't even work on a non-4K HDTV (despite it saying it does). Hardly any of the games work, and the ones that do strangely stop working with time. The controllers do the same. Adding games is incredibly difficult, too. The format is some obscure Chinese type that is VERY difficult to use with USA computers or OSs. It's not as easy as just "adding games". There is not an "OFF/ON" switch, so you just unplug it. Startup takes FOREVER. The games included mostly suck, too. Overall, not worth the money because it's unpredictable and the included SD card isn't even compatible with most non-China OS PCs. This is why people don't trust the products made in China.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my buddies kids which i babysit sometimes. At first I was overwhelmed with the amount of games. But once I learned how to break it down to each system it was beyond great. Kids never get to bed on time when this comes out!
